Strength.description: A measure of your raw physical power. It affects how much you can carry and the damage of all melee attacks.

Perception.description: Perception is a measurement of your environmental and situational awareness. It directly affects weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S., lock-picking skills, and successful attempts at stealing items.

Endurance.description: A measure of your overall physical fitness. It affects your total Health and the Action Point drain from sprinting.

Charisma.description: Your ability to charm and convince others. It affects your success to persuade in dialogue, prices when you barter, and the maximum number of settlers in settlements.

Intelligence.description: A measure of your overall mental acuity. It affects the number of Experience Points earned and reduces the number of dud words when hacking terminals.

Agility.description: A measure of your overall finesse and reflexes. It affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S. and your ability to sneak.

Luck.description: A measure of your general good fortune and affects the recharge rate of critical hits.
